  • Constructor Details

    • MessageHandler

      public MessageHandler (NetworkState state)
      Used to translate and encode the messages. Creates the correct event and uses the listeners to handle it.
      Parameters:
      state - is the network state, used to send the messages

      public void loginMessageReceiver (Socket socket, LoginPayload loginPayload, GamePhases gamePhases)
      Used to set the username, color and wizard of the player
      Parameters:
      socket - is the source socket
      loginPayload - is the payload containing the info
      gamePhases - is the current phase of the login

    • userReconnectedReceiver

      public void userReconnectedReceiver (ReconnectedEvent evt)
      This method is used to inform controller about the new client and the client about his username. The client has to set the username, he hasn't chosen.
      Parameters:
      evt - contains information about the socket of the new client and his username.

    • eventPerformed

      public boolean resumeGame()

      Returns:
      whether the method was successful
